channel.title: A couple questions
channel.description:
Ok, i got a few questions.
How do i add an alter? Theres not one on my server atm.
How do i change drops?
Peaple can eat manta ray on my server VERY fast.
How do i change what npc's say and how do i change the chat, it syas welcom to all-star scape and i need to change that.
How do i change when i go to quests it says all-star scape and i wanna change it to eaglescape.
Theres a screen that pops up when u get on. I need to remove that or change what it says.
I dont hold godswords right.
Thanks if you help me :)
and if someone can check to see if other peaple can get on my server that would help alot. It's eaglescape.no-ip.org on silabsoft. Thanks. Pm Zerker Owns or Eagle if u get on.

item.title: A couple questions
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

to add an alter, just add it as a global object
change drops in item2.java
add a eating timer
to change npc shouts, npchandler.java
go in client.java and search for all the all-star scape and chnage it to eaglescape (considered leeching)
look in ur initialize method or ur run method in client.java for the interface it opens…

Read full topic
